memberdef.name: allphone_funcs
memberdef.initializer: = { allphone_search_start, allphone_search_step, allphone_search_finish, allphone_search_reinit, allphone_search_free, allphone_search_lattice, allphone_search_hyp, allphone_search_prob, allphone_search_seg_iter, }

briefdescription.para: Find PHMM node with same senone sequence and tmat id as the given triphone.

detaileddescription.para: Return ptr to PHMM node if found, NULL otherwise.

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *name, ngram_model_t *lm, cmd_ln_t *config, acmod_t *acmod, dict_t *dict, dict2pid_t *d2p)
memberdef.name: allphone_search_init

briefdescription.para: Create, initialize and return a search module.
Prepare the allphone search structure for beginning decoding of the next utterance.
Step one frame forward through the Viterbi search.
Windup and clean the allphone search structure after utterance.
Get hypothesis string from the allphone search.
